Field.FormMenuDescription: Patient Assessment Of Care For Chronic Conditions (PACIC - 20)
Field.ElementPreceedingHeader:
Assessment of Care for Chronic Conditions
Staying healthy can be difficult when you have a chronic condition. We would like to learn about the type of help with your condition you get from your health care team. This might include your regular doctor, his or her nurse, or physician's assistant who treats your illness. Your answers will be kept confidential and will not be shared with your physician or clinic.
Over the past 6 months, when I received care for my chronic conditions, I was:
Field.ElementLabel: 1. Asked for my ideas when we made a treatment plan.

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, None of the Time 
 2, A Little of the Time 
 3, Some of the Time 
 4, Most of the Time 
 5, Always

Field.ElementLabel: 2. Given choices about treatment to think about.

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, None of the Time 
 2, A Little of the Time 
 3, Some of the Time 
 4, Most of the Time 
 5, Always

Field.ElementLabel: 3. Asked to talk about any problems with my medicines or their effects.

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, None of the Time 
 2, A Little of the Time 
 3, Some of the Time 
 4, Most of the Time 
 5, Always

Field.ElementLabel: 4. Given a written list of things I should do to improve my health.

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, None of the Time 
 2, A Little of the Time 
 3, Some of the Time 
 4, Most of the Time 
 5, Always

Field.ElementLabel: 5. Satisfied that my care was well organized.

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, None of the Time 
 2, A Little of the Time 
 3, Some of the Time 
 4, Most of the Time 
 5, Always

Field.ElementLabel: 6. Shown how what I did to take care of myself influenced my condition.

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, None of the Time 
 2, A Little of the Time 
 3, Some of the Time 
 4, Most of the Time 
 5, Always

Field.ElementLabel: 7. Asked to talk about my goals in caring for my condition.

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, None of the Time 
 2, A Little of the Time 
 3, Some of the Time 
 4, Most of the Time 
 5, Always

Field.ElementLabel: 8. Helped to set specific goals to improve my eating or exercise.

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, None of the Time 
 2, A Little of the Time 
 3, Some of the Time 
 4, Most of the Time 
 5, Always

Field.ElementLabel: 9. Given a copy of my treatment plan.

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, None of the Time 
 2, A Little of the Time 
 3, Some of the Time 
 4, Most of the Time 
 5, Always

Field.ElementLabel: 10. Encouraged to go to a specific group or class to help me cope with my chronic condition.

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, None of the Time 
 2, A Little of the Time 
 3, Some of the Time 
 4, Most of the Time 
 5, Always

Field.ElementLabel: 11. Asked questions, either directly or on a survey, about my health habits.

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, None of the Time 
 2, A Little of the Time 
 3, Some of the Time 
 4, Most of the Time 
 5, Always

Field.ElementLabel: 12. Sure that my doctor or nurse thought about my values, beliefs, and traditions when they recommended treatments to me.

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, None of the Time 
 2, A Little of the Time 
 3, Some of the Time 
 4, Most of the Time 
 5, Always

Field.ElementLabel: 13. Helped to make a treatment plan that I could carry out in my daily life.

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, None of the Time 
 2, A Little of the Time 
 3, Some of the Time 
 4, Most of the Time 
 5, Always

Field.ElementLabel: 14. Helped to plan ahead so I could take care of my condition even in hard times.

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, None of the Time 
 2, A Little of the Time 
 3, Some of the Time 
 4, Most of the Time 
 5, Always

Field.ElementLabel: 15. Asked how my chronic condition affects my life.

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, None of the Time 
 2, A Little of the Time 
 3, Some of the Time 
 4, Most of the Time 
 5, Always

Field.ElementLabel: 16. Contacted after a visit to see how things were going.

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, None of the Time 
 2, A Little of the Time 
 3, Some of the Time 
 4, Most of the Time 
 5, Always

Field.ElementLabel: 17. Encouraged to attend programs in the community that could help me.

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, None of the Time 
 2, A Little of the Time 
 3, Some of the Time 
 4, Most of the Time 
 5, Always

Field.ElementLabel: 18. Referred to a dietitian, health educator, or counselor.

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, None of the Time 
 2, A Little of the Time 
 3, Some of the Time 
 4, Most of the Time 
 5, Always

Field.ElementLabel: 19. Told how my visits with other types of doctors, like an eye doctor or other specialist, helped my treatment.

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, None of the Time 
 2, A Little of the Time 
 3, Some of the Time 
 4, Most of the Time 
 5, Always

Field.ElementLabel: 20. Asked how my visits with other doctors were going.

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, None of the Time 
 2, A Little of the Time 
 3, Some of the Time 
 4, Most of the Time 
 5, Always
